name: Mirroom
description:
Miroom is a first person puzzle game where you use mirros as portals. 

Out of boredom, you find a sticky note which invites you to walk through the mirror. As the journey progresses, the sticky notes encourage you to explore the room and interact it, even if it means breaking the rules of our reality.

  • Arrow keys : Move
  • Left click : Grab an object/Interact
  • Right click : Drop an object

Game made with Unity and Blender

Fonts used : Frenchpress and Renner
